overview:
Andreas Heyden is Managing Director & COO of ProSiebenSat.1 Games GmbH since November 2011. He joined the ProSiebenSat.1 Group in September 2011.

Prior to joining ProSiebenSat.1 Games GmbH he was Managing Director for Sevenload where he was responsible for the collaboration with Content and Distribution partners as well as the internationalization of the Portal.

Prior to that he worked for RTL Interactive, where he managed the innovation and production unit and was responsible for the development of new internet business models, among the Games business.

He began his career in 1996 at Metronet AG, Subscriber Marketing. Since 1997 Andreas Heyden worked for I-D Media AG as a consultant and transferred after a career stopover in Singapore 1999 to Microsoft GmbH in the field of Product Marketing for MSN.de

In his role as Managing Director of ProSiebenSat.1 Games, he is responsible for the sections “Internationalization”, “Production” and “Business Intelligence and Payment”
